item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing Vanilla Our current installation and upgrade instructions are in the README file that comes with Vanilla. If you run into issues, see the Developers > Troubleshooting section of these docs. Cloud Solution For a 1-click installation hosted plan with professional support and services, see Vanilla Forums Cloud Hosting plans.
